title: For anyone who hasn't seen the new Dr Mundo Q animation

embed.description: I'm testing out a new Dr. Mundo Q animation. If you guys like this it will be grouped in with the animation update work that @RoryAlderton is doing on runs! https://t.co/6llLcoWjS9

replies.body:
From what I can tell, it just adds a bit of follow-through to the throw, right? I'm not sure why it's so amazing, but as long as it makes you happy. :)

...I'm still gonna be banning Mundo in every draft game I play, by the way.
When I first watched the clip I thought what was going at first was the new animation, and I thought, "Looks pretty much the same as what it is now..."
For those wondering the background song is called "Sugar, Sugar" 1969. Oldie song, really catchy.
I highly recommend checking out the rest of the twitter account, there's so many others
